TopicTitle: How do you convert .21 craft files to work in .22 career mode?

Articles.Content:
When a craft file from an earlier version exists in the folder, in career mode, the load window will not open. Is there a workaround?

Thanks.
You can't load it because you haven't unlocked all the parts in that craft I believe
That would be logical, though the whole window doesn't come up and there is no error message, and I think I have all the parts needed unlocked.

That would be logical, though the whole window doesn't come up and there is no error message, and I think I have all the parts needed unlocked.

You say 'Think' Go to the link or place you downloaded the .Craft file, See what parts it has, Load up your KSP, See if you have those parts unlocked. If not, There you go. Unlock them and it Should work.
I've found that if I copied over any of my craft files that had a locked part, NO ships would appear at all in my load menu.
